charts.name: Request Rate
charts.description: Latest request rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Request Rate
charts.description: Average request rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Top Requests
charts.description: Requests that were made most frequently in the selected time window. Click a request to drill down to related traces.

charts.name: Errors
charts.description: Latest error rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Error (%)
charts.description: Average error rate in the selected time window.

charts.name: Top Failed Requests
charts.description: Requests that failed most frequently in the selected time window. Click a request to drill down to related traces.

charts.name: Latency
charts.description: Latest latency in the selected time window.

charts.name: Latency
charts.description: Average, median and P95 latency in the selected time window.

charts.name: Slowest Requests (P95)
charts.description: Slowest requests in the selected time window. Click a request to drill down to related traces.

charts.name: Request Latency
charts.description: Request latency histogram. Click a histogram column to view traces related to that percentile.

charts.name: Apdex Score
charts.description: Apdex score based on the threshold latency and all the requests made to this service.

charts.name: Apdex over time
charts.description: Apdex score over time based on the threshold latency and all the requests made to this service.

sources.name: Source
sources.query: if(exists(limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.cpu.usage_rate", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*"))), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.cpu.usage_rate", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*")), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.cpu.usage_rate", cluster="*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*")))

sources.name: A
sources.query: if(exists(limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.memory.working_set", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*"))), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.memory.working_set", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*")), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.memory.working_set", cluster="*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*")))

sources.name: A
sources.query: if(exists(limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.restart_count", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*"))), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.restart_count", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*")), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.restart_count", cluster="*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*")))

sources.name: Source
sources.query: if(exists(limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.rx", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*"))), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.rx", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*")), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.rx", cluster="*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*")))

sources.name: Source
sources.query: if(exists(limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.tx", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*"))), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.tx", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*")), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.tx", cluster="*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*")))

sources.name: rx_errors
sources.query: if(exists(limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.rx_errors", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*"))), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.rx_errors", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*")), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.rx_errors", cluster="*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*")))

sources.name: tx_errors
sources.query: if(exists(limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.tx_errors", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*"))), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.tx_errors", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*")), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.network.tx_errors", cluster="*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*")))

sources.name: Source
sources.query: if(exists(limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.filesystem.usage", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*"))), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.filesystem.usage", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*")), limit(250, ts("kubernetes.pod.filesystem.usage", cluster="*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*")))

sources.name: pods_pending
sources.query: if(exists(ts("kubernetes.pod.status.phase", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*" and phase="Pending")), ts("kubernetes.pod.status.phase", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*" and phase="Pending"), ts("kubernetes.pod.status.phase", cluster="*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*" and phase="Pending"))

sources.name: pods_failed
sources.query: if(exists(ts("kubernetes.pod.status.phase", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*" and phase="Failed")), ts("kubernetes.pod.status.phase", cluster="*" and nodename="${source_wildcard}*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*" and phase="Failed"), ts("kubernetes.pod.status.phase", cluster="*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*" and namespace_name="${source_wildcard}*" and phase="Failed"))

valuesToReadableStrings.default: application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and source="${source}" and span.kind?="${spanKind}"

cluster.queryValue: collect(sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and not "_synthetic"="true"), cluster), taggify(1, "cluster", "*"))
cluster.label: cluster

valuesToReadableStrings.default: application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and span.kind?="${spanKind}"

source_wildcard.queryValue: aliasSource(ts(~component.heartbeat, not "_synthetic"="true" and application=${application}), tagK, application,0,"-")
source_wildcard.label: K8s Provider

spanKind.queryValue: collect(sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and not "_synthetic"="true"), "span.kind"), taggify(1, "span.kind", "*"))
spanKind.label: spanKind

source.queryValue: collect(sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and not "_synthetic"="true"), sources), aliasSource(1, "*"))
source.label: source

shard.queryValue: collect(sum(ts(~component.heartbeat, application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and not "_synthetic"="true"), shard), taggify(1, "shard", "*"))
shard.label: shard

valuesToReadableStrings.default: application="${application}" and service="${service}" and cluster="${cluster}" and shard="${shard}" and source="${source}"
